name: Custertruck remake (Student Project)
description:
This was a scool project for DAE Howest in my first year.

The assignment was to choose a game and recreate a part of it.

I chose clustertruck because landfall is a very inspiring company, doing what they love and making amazing games.

Game made by Vindevogel Taho

Music done by: Soetewey Ischa

ClusterTruck Model by VindevogelTaho on Sketchfab
